name: EncourageMe
0:
”Alexa, ask Encourage Me to say that I'm beautiful”
”Alexa, ask Encourage Me to encourage me not to sneak ice cream”
”Alexa, ask Encourage Me to encourage me to go to bed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: encourage me
des: Need a little extra motivation to not eat that brownie? Need a reminder of just how wonderful you are? With Encourage Me, Alexa is there to lend a hand! Just ask Encourage Me, and Alexa will give you the compliment or encouragement you need.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
